snippet: Refugees poured into Arsal, Lebanon, amid reports that a battle was beginning along the Syrian border.
abstract: Hundreds of new Syrian refugees arrive in Arsal, Lebanon, amid reports that battle is brewing in Syrian border district of Qalamoun.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and ANNE BARNARD

lead_paragraph: Refugees poured into Arsal, Lebanon, amid reports that a battle was beginning along the Syrian border.

headline.main: New Syrian Refugees Descend on Lebanon
headline.print_headline: New Syrian Refugees Descend on Lebanon
